name: Jetstream
body:
![http://badge.fury.io/py/jetstream](https://badge.fury.io/py/jetstream.png)  ![https://travis-ci.org/koodaamo/jetstream](https://travis-ci.org/koodaamo/jetstream.png?branch=master)  ![https://crate.io/packages/jetstream?version=latest](https://pypip.in/d/jetstream/badge.png)

Jetstream is a modular data processing framework for retrieval, processing
and outputting data. It is written in Python.

* License: GPL3
* Documentation: <http://jetstream.rtfd.org>.

Installation:

  `pip install jetstream`.

Jetstream consists of the following packages:

* [jetstream.core](https://github.com/koodaamo/jetstream.core.git)
* [jetstream.cli](https://github.com/koodaamo/jetstream.cli.git)

The following packages are under development; they will be pulled in once
they are released.

* jetstream.http - read and write via HTTP
* jetstream.csv - read and write CSV files
* jetstream.sql - SQL db read and write
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
